      • payUser

        void payUser​(String recipientUserName,
             double amount)
      throws net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException,
             com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException
        Sends money from this user to the one provided in the function.
        Parameters:
        recipientUserName - Username of the player who will receive money.
        amount - amount to transfer
        Throws:
        net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException - Exception thrown if the recipient has too much money.
        com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException - Exception thrown if the player doesn't have enough money.

      • payUser

        void payUser​(IEssentialsUser recipientUser,
             double amount)
      throws net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException,
             com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException
        Refer to payUser(String, double)
        Parameters:
        recipientUser - Essentials User wrapper
        amount - amount to transfer
        Throws:
        net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException - Exception thrown if the recipient has too much money.
        com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException - Exception thrown if the player doesn't have enough money

      throws net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException,

        Refer to payUser(String, double)
        Parameters:

        amount - amount to transfer

      • payUserExact

        void payUserExact​(String recipientUserName,
                  BigDecimal amount)
           throws net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException,
                  com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException
        Sends money from this user to the one provided in the function.
        Uses BigDecimal for accuracy.
        Parameters:
        recipientUserName - Username of the player who will receive money.
        amount - amount to transfer
        Throws:
        net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException - Exception thrown if the recipient has too much money.
        com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException - Exception thrown if the player doesn't have enough money.

      • payUserExact

        Refer to payUserExact(String, BigDecimal)
        Parameters:
        recipientUser - Essentials User wrapper
        amount - amount to transfer
        Throws:
        net.ess3.api.MaxMoneyException - Exception thrown if the recipient has too much money.
        com.earth2me.essentials.ChargeException - Exception thrown if the player doesn't have enough money
